title: Cotton and Microfibre Floor Cloth, 50 x 50 cm
features: Quality materials: the floor cloth is made of 50% cotton and 50% microfiber, offering an ideal combination of absorbency and durability
PERFECT SIZE - With its size of 50x50cm, this floor cloth is ideal for easily cleaning large surfaces
Easy to clean: the cloth can be washed by hand or machine up to 40 degrees without using fabric softeners, making its maintenance simple and convenient
Rectangular design: the rectangular shape of the cloth makes it easy to use and adaptable to different surfaces
Optimal absorption: thanks to its cotton and microfiber composition, the cloth offers quick and effective absorption, leaving floors dry and clean in no time
description: Cotton and microfibre floor cloth; Measurements: 50 x 50 cm; Instructions for use: Wash the floor cloth before first use. Rinse well and wring out the floor cloth after each use and then dry flat. Do not use the floor cloth with bleach and harsh detergents. The floor cloth can be washed by hand with neutral detergent or in the washing machine up to 40 °C, but without using fabric softeners
